name: Re:post
description:
You are a blog journalist. Pick out the news from the TV and post it on your blog.

Each posts attract clicks. Clicks generate money. You will receive your money the following day after posting.

You have a rating. Get too low and you are fired.

The quality of the news (represented by the green tint) affects your post, and subsequently your rating in the server.

The news quality doesn't represent the ammount of clicks you will get.
